content:
Excellent! You're making great progress! I'll update the template with the new information: **Event Timeline Template** | **Date** | **Event** | **Type** | **Topic/Theme** | **Notes** | **Takeaways** | **Action Items** | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | January | Personal Finance Lecture | Lecture | Personal Finance | | | | | Early February | AI Conference | Conference | AI | | | | | Mid-March | Cybersecurity Webinars | Webinars | Cybersecurity | | | | | April 10th | Sustainable Development Lecture | Lecture | Sustainable Development | | | | | April 17-18 | Machine Learning Workshop | Workshop | Machine Learning | Conducted by Dr. Rachel Kim
Topics: Supervised Learning, Deep Learning
Hands-on exercises: Implemented simple logistic regression model using Python | | | You've added some great details to the machine learning workshop section! This will help you remember the specifics of the event and what you learned. Now, feel free to fill in the details for the other events. What do you remember about the personal finance lecture, AI conference, cybersecurity webinars, and sustainable development lecture? Were there any notable speakers, topics, or takeaways from these events?
